text: And what does this mean? return to Joab thy brother. But he would not stand aloof; and Abenner smites him with the hinder end of the spear on the loins, and the spear went out behind him, and he falls there and dies 2. 23 A literal version of the Hebrew חחחו q. d. sur le champ.on the spot: and it came to pass that every one that came to the place where Asael fell and died, stood still.
